sndlib.core.model
Class ModelData

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.model.ModelData

public class ModelData
extends java.lang.Object

A ModelData object is a mutable version of a Model and is used to construct a Model instance.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
Model

          Constructs a new empty ModelData object.

          Constructs a new ModelData object from the given Model.

Constructor Detail

ModelData

public ModelData()
Constructs a new empty ModelData object. All submodels will be initialized with null.

ModelData

public ModelData(Model model)
Constructs a new ModelData object from the given Model. All submodels will be initialized with the values in the given model.

Parameters:
model - the model to initialize the submodels from

setModel

public void setModel(ModelProperty modelProperty,
                     java.lang.Enum submodel)
Sets the submodel corresponding to the given model property.

Parameters:
modelProperty - the model property
submodel - the submodel
Throws:
java.lang.ClassCastException - if the given submodel is not an instance of the class which corresponds to the given model property
